River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, but the crowning descision made by director Vincent Ward is the complete lack of subtitles for the Maori dialect even when non-Maori characters are speaking to each other.
This film would make an excellent History Channel special, but Ward's apparent goal was to make a more traditional, "cinematic" movie

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three AVENGING FORCE films, all of which are based on the TV series.
